WorkItem.Description:
simple repro just add this to a file:
var data = "ÓÑè"; // U+E10F

Compile it and I get the error message:
Error 5 Microsoft JScript runtime error: Invalid procedure call or argument tsc.js 4500 13
WorkItem.Summary: An uncommented string with the character U+E10F crashes tsc.exe

Comments.Message: This was in a file with Unicode Codepage 1200 encoding. Switching this file to UTF-8 fixed the issue for me actually. I think you can probably close this issue.
